mapper.select: select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, app_id, secret_id, secret_key from sys_out_api where id = #{id}

select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, app_id, secret_id, secret_key from sys_out_api where id in
#{item}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_out_api( id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, app_id, secret_id, secret_key) values (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser}, #{appId}, #{secretId}, #{secretKey})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_out_api where 1=1
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
